title: Monday Post Show (01-31-22)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (01-31-22)
description:
Bobby shares stories he didn’t get to over the weekend including a person who almost burned their house down with a flamethrower and a crazy parlay bet that hit for half a million dollars. A gamer broke his neck while using a VR headset. Bobby reveals things he had to cancel last week because he got sick. He addresses how people were calling him “Adele”. Amy also updates us on if her dad knew Colonel Sanders. We also update on Bobby’s missing money. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Amy also updates us on if her dad knew Colonel Sanders. We also update on Bobby’s missing money.
